dct_title_s: Tourist map of Greece / published by the National Tourist Office of Greece. (Cover)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Legend in English and French includes highways' distances in kilometers, railroads, tourist sites, monasteries, mineral springs, summit heights in meters. Includes ancillary map locating Greece in Europe. "No. 19 - 10.000 - Aug. 1952. Edited by the National Tourist Office of Greece - Athens."
